title: Shall We Lance?
description:
Mina is joined by Football Outsider's Derrik Klassen to preview the NFC West; including their thoughts on Mina's beloved Seahawks, the obstacles the Rams have to face in order to repeat, if Trey Lance can be successful, and what the Cardinals have to do to let Kyler Murray succeed.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
